20101225030138.000|20101225030140.000|CC1|"LOCKUP: EXTENDED STAY" AT      
20101225030140.000|20101225030141.000|CC1|MARICOPA COUNTY JAIL IN PHOENIX,
20101225030141.000|20101225030143.000|CC1|ARIZONA, WE KNEW WE WERE GOING  
20101225030143.000|20101225030145.000|CC1|TO A PLACE WHERE MOST OF AMERICA
20101225030145.000|20101225030146.000|CC1|HAD HEARD ABOUT.                
20101225030146.000|20101225030148.000|CC1|IT'S A CONTROVERSIAL JAIL WITH A
20101225030148.000|20101225030151.000|CC1|CONTROVERSIAL SHERIFF.          
20101225030151.000|20101225030151.000|CC1|OUR APPROACH WAS TO EMBED OUR   
20101225030151.000|20101225030154.000|CC1|CREW FOR FOUR MONTHS, I MEAN,   
20101225030154.000|20101225030158.000|CC1|REALLY SPEND A LOT OF TIME AND  
20101225030158.000|20101225030159.000|CC1|TELL THE TRUE STORY OF AMERICA'S
20101225030159.000|20101225030203.000|CC1|TOUGHEST JAIL.                  
20101225030203.000|20101225030203.000|CC1|>> ON ANY GIVEN DAY, THERE ARE  
20101225030203.000|20101225030204.000|CC1|MORE THAN 9,000 MALE AND FEMALE 
20101225030204.000|20101225030205.000|CC1|INMATES INCARCERATED AT         
20101225030205.000|20101225030207.000|CC1|MARICOPA.                       
20101225030207.000|20101225030210.000|CC1|MOST HAVE NOT BEEN CONVICTED OF 
20101225030210.000|20101225030213.000|CC1|THE CRIMES WITH WHICH THEY'VE   
20101225030213.000|20101225030214.000|CC1|BEEN CHARGED, BUT ARE ON OR ARE 
20101225030214.000|20101225030215.000|CC1|AWAITING TRIAL.                 
20101225030215.000|20101225030216.000|CC1|THEY'RE HOUSED IN SIX DIFFERENT 
20101225030216.000|20101225030220.000|CC1|FACILITIES.                     
20101225030220.000|20101225030221.000|CC1|>> I WOULD DESCRIBE MARICOPA    
20101225030221.000|20101225030222.000|CC1|COUNTY JAIL AS, LIKE, NO OTHER  
20101225030222.000|20101225030227.000|CC1|JAIL I'VE EVER SEEN BEFORE.     
20101225030227.000|20101225030228.000|CC1|FIRST OF ALL, THE SHEER VOLUME  
20101225030228.000|20101225030231.000|CC1|OF IT IS STAGGERING.            
20101225030231.000|20101225030232.000|CC1|SO JUST WALKING IN THERE AND    
20101225030232.000|20101225030235.000|CC1|FIGURING OUT WHO'S IMPORTANT,   
20101225030235.000|20101225030236.000|CC1|HOW THE SYSTEMS WORK, EVEN HOW  
20101225030236.000|20101225030237.000|CC1|YOU GET THROUGH THE DOORS IS A  
20101225030237.000|20101225030238.000|CC1|CHALLENGE.                      
20101225030238.000|20101225030241.000|CC1|>> GO TO THE WEST GATES, SEE THE
20101225030241.000|20101225030244.000|CC1|OFFICER VON REAGAN.             
20101225030244.000|20101225030245.000|CC1|>> THE MARICOPA COUNTY JAIL HAS 
20101225030245.000|20101225030247.000|CC1|BEEN THE SUBJECT OF MORE MEDIA  
20101225030247.000|20101225030248.000|CC1|ATTENTION THAN PROBABLY ANY     
20101225030248.000|20101225030249.000|CC1|OTHER JAIL IN AMERICA.          
20101225030249.000|20101225030252.000|CC1|IN RECENT YEARS IT'S BEEN DUE TO
20101225030252.000|20101225030253.000|CC1|THE COUNTY'S POLICIES TOWARD    
20101225030253.000|20101225030256.000|CC1|ILLEGAL IMMIGRANTS.             
20101225030256.000|20101225030257.000|CC1|BEFORE THAT, MUCH OF THE        
20101225030257.000|20101225030258.000|CC1|COVERAGE CENTERED ON ITS        
20101225030258.000|20101225030302.000|CC1|PRACTICES.                      
20101225030302.000|20101225030303.000|CC1|SUCH AS CONSTRUCTING AN OUTDOOR 
20101225030303.000|20101225030306.000|CC1|HOUSING FACILITY WITH TENTS.    
20101225030306.000|20101225030307.000|CC1|THE STRIPED UNIFORMS AND PINK   
20101225030307.000|20101225030308.000|CC1|UNDERWEAR INMATES ARE REQUIRED  
20101225030308.000|20101225030313.000|CC1|TO WEAR.                        
20101225030313.000|20101225030314.000|CC1|AND THE USE OF CHAIN GANGS TO   
20101225030314.000|20101225030315.000|CC1|PERFORM EVERYTHING FROM         
20101225030315.000|20101225030316.000|CC1|MAINTENANCE WORK TO BURYING THE 
20101225030316.000|20101225030317.000|CC1|INDIGENT.

20101225030317.000|20101225030320.000|CC1|RUN THE JAIL SINCE 1992.        
20101225030320.000|20101225030323.000|CC1|SHERIFF JOE ARPAIO.             
20101225030323.000|20101225030328.000|CC1|>> ONE OF MY PHILOSOPHIES IS YOU

20101225030340.000|20101225030343.000|CC1|BE A HILTON HOTEL LIKE SOME

20101225030345.000|20101225030345.000|CC1|EDUCATION.

20101225030816.000|20101225030817.000|CC1|WITH THE PROPER EQUIPMENT YOU

20101225030820.000|20101225030821.000|CC1|YOU KNOW, I MEAN, YOU'RE TAKEN  
20101225030821.000|20101225030822.000|CC1|CARE OF AS A HUMANE PERSON.

20101225032657.000|20101225032658.000|CC1|HOUSING UNIT THAT WAS LIKE      
20101225032658.000|20101225032659.000|CC1|NOTHING WE HAD EVER ENCOUNTERED 
20101225032659.000|20101225032710.000|CC1|BEFORE.                         
20101225032710.000|20101225032711.000|CC1|>> WHEN YOU ENTER THE ESTRELLA

20101225032711.000|20101225032712.000|CC1|WOMEN ARE HOUSED WITHIN THE
